nodes.text: Operation Molecular Clamp was the first of four small operations that was led by Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader in 1 ABY against the increasing activity of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In order to fulfill the mission, Vader recruited an Imperial agent, who subsequently hunted down and killed ten members of the Rebel Alliance.

This is the first of four missions in Star Wars Galaxies that players of the Imperial faction receive from Lord Vader during one of his sporadic appearances in Bestine, Coronet City or Theed. The player has to kill ten Rebel NPCs of any level or type, and receives Imperial faction points as a reward.
